message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $10,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Bob, but $7,000 is quite low.  How about we meet in the middle at $8,500?
I'm still not convinced that $8,500 is the best price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $7,500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $8,200 is my final offer. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product.
I'm still not convinced that $8,200 is the best price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $7,800, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you consider that?
